attributes.action: Bring back the right to buy/aquire for the rest of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: I have been living in my home for 15 years have paid more then half off the current market asking price in rent, and therefore would like to have the right to own my property which I currently live. This would make for an easier life and secure my family future aswell as many others.
attributes.background:
Bring back the right to buy/ 
aquire for all council or housing association homes in the UK

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/
